attributes.action: Make it obligatory to state cholesterol levels on all meat produce.
attributes.additional_details:
Documentaries- What the health, Food choices, Food Matters, Earthlings, Cowspiracy, Forks Over Knives, Engine 2 diet. 
Books- How not to die, The China Study
attributes.background: Cholesterol is linked to many diseases e.g heart disease, Alzheimer's disease etc. Many customers are unaware of the harm that meat can cause. Also, many people consume too much meat. Perhaps solely have the limit and you could cut back on the risks of these diseases escalating.
